metadata.name: Review Producer API As Consumer
metadata.shortDescription: Review functional spec + OpenAPI from a consumer perspective and produce questions for producers plus early dev priorities.
metadata.description: For a demand folder, select the latest functional specification and OpenAPI contract, perform a consumer-driven review to identify unclear behaviors, integration risks, and contract gaps, and produce a structured review document with questions for the producer team.
objectives: Select latest functional spec and OpenAPI artifacts for a demand
Identify consumer-facing questions and ambiguities blocking implementation
Identify early development priorities and high-risk integration areas
Produce a structured consumer review under docs/specifications/{demand_folder}/09-consumer-review
metadata.author: OLAF Framework
